headline: ComEd Awards Scholarships to Nine Chicagoland Students, Aids Pursuit of STEM Degrees
summary: CHICAGO, February 20, 2025--Acting on its commitment to promoting equitable opportunities in science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM) education, ComEd has announced nine students currently pursuing STEM-related degrees at Chicago State University (CSU) as its 2025 ComEd Scholars.
